message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $900,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you, but I'm open to negotiating. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $750,000. This product is valuable to me, but I'm also conscious of my budget. What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $850,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $800,000. If you're serious about selling, I think this is a fair compromise.

Hi Bob, I understand your willingness to compromise, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800,000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $825,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to sell.
